00011     def fitness(self, ind, user_feedback):
00012         '''
00013         Compute fitness.
00014         user_feedback is [best]
00015         '''
00016         best = user_feedback[0]
00017         subj = 0
00018         if ind.genome == best.genome:
00019             subj = self.geneLen
00020         else:
00021             subj += hamming(ind, best)
00022 
00023         ind.scalefit = ind.fitness = subj
00024

00027     def draw(self, parentPanel, subset):
00028         '''
00029         Return a list of panels to be displayed to the user for evaluation.
00030         Use the arg parentPanel as the parent for each of the panels created.
00031         '''
00032         panels = []
00033         for i in xrange(len(subset)):
00034             data = self.decode(subset[i].genome)
00035             panels.append(gl.OpenGLPanel(parentPanel, i, data))
00036         return panels

00040     def report(self, pop, gen):
00041 
00042         best = max(pop)
00043         sumFit = reduce(lambda a,b: a + b.fitness, pop, 0)
00044             
00045         print '%i) Best Fit: %.2f, Avg Fit: %.2f' % (gen, best.fitness, sumFit/len(pop))
